div.p: OF THE DAY ABOUT THE TIP OF THE DAY.
PLEASE STAY WITH ME. MANY OF YOU ASKED THAT I PUT THE
TIPS OF THE DAY IN BOOK FORM. WE HAD TOO MANY BOOKS SO WE
PRINTED "FACTOR TIPS" AND YOU CAN GET IT FREE OF CHARGE IF YOU
BUY STUFF ON BILLOREILLY.COM. $59.95 WORTH IN FACT.
IT’S NOT A BAIT AND SWITCH. I HAVE MENTIONED WE HAVE THE
STORE SO WE CAN GIVE MONEY TO CHARITY.
WE HAVE GIVEN MILLIONS OVER THE YEARS.
I HOPE THAT’S AN INCENTIVE TO BUY.
BOOKS, USA STRONG GEAR, THIS IS GREAT STUFF.
YOU CAN GET IT NOWHERE ELSE EXCEPT ON OUR WEBSITE.
IF YOU BUY STUFF THERE YOU GET THE FACTOR TIPS BOOK FREE.
IF YOU BECOME A PREMIUM MEMBER YOU GET ANY OF MY BOOKS FREE,
YOUR CHOICE. WE WANT EVERYBODY TO WIN.
THE CHARITIES, YOU, EVERYBODY. WE HOPE THEY DO.
FINALLY THE MAIL. LAURA FROM PITTSBURGH,
PENNSYLVANIA. WHAT DOES PRESIDENT OBAMA MEAN
BY "INCOME EQUALITY." THOSE EARNING GOOD SALARIES
